TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hosing_Ku, title = Hosing_Ku, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hosing_Ku} }

S.FORM: == Hosing Ku(復興區 qalang Pyasan) == Pyasan hiya' ga spyang ini khmay squliq nya maki sa Toweng. Pyasan hiya' ga qutux lahuy qalang rgyax. Hosing Ku (復興區, Pyasan) mki sku Toweng si. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 336.75 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 195.32 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 120.65 km²), 10,692 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 3,655 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 6,817 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 64%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Tayan ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. rhzyal kki'an Xusing ga cyux maki sa tong nan na Toweng sohih Sinciku, yatux ga sobih Cyama. rekisi Fuxing , lalu' nya 'Tayal sraral ga Pyasan, trang maki Gipun ga Sinciku syu Cyma gun, masup pciriq lga sllwan nha Pyasan. kawas 1954 te mpou byacing ru mtzyul ryax lga sllwan nha Fuxing syang la. skahul sinbung minrwan trang ryax nasa ga, "m_yan nyux sqqas ita' 'Tayal mha hintgan na soto ki nyux nha galun Taywan" lma', ru spwah nha syang kong so' miru biru teta smwan qu sexu'. kawas 2014 te mopu sazing byacing mpusal magal ryax, yugun na sexu Toyen keng sa Toyen si' lga, yasa gmlu m'iyuw sa Fuxing cyu'i la. Kawas 2014 spwah nha "Taywan gyencumin pulwo sintong lyenmong"kmal mha aki zyugun lalu na "Pyasan"squ "Pyaway"ini ga "Pyasan Pyaway", ana ga ini swali' 'Tayal qalang Pyasan. ays ptyaw sebu Hosing Ku ays psgayun 10 ru 58 alang. 58 alang hani ga, Pyasan , Rahaw(Takan) , Wsilung , Hbun , Hbun-sinqumi , Kinyawpan , Rangay , Kawbu' , Khpan , Raga' , Rahu' , Qapu' , Qus , Yubang , Triqan , Zihing , Kayu-baliq , Kzyay , Tuba , Luhung , Blhuy , Blhuy , Bilus , Qoyaw , Qoyaw , Silong , Qoyaw , Snazi , Kin'lwan , Sqiy , Cyasi , Yuwhbun raka , Kayway , Qus , Qmocyan ,Babau , Qnau , Ksunu' , Qehuy , Kuli , Sbunaw , Quri , Uruw , Tkasan , Raka , Piyaway , Tgleq , Saruc , Twan nokan , Zihing , Qrahu , Tqwiy , Ngurus , Qphay , Balung , 'Bu balung , Qara , Quzi . rhzyal​ tay 'zil na Hosing Ku hya' ga wsilung krahu'. tay 'zil na Hosing Ku hya' ga Nahuy go, Kansai go. tuqi qsya' ki rrhzyal maki na ryax khangan Gipun na' ga kya magal qu ulay nya, nanu sga "Syasan, Qrahu', Pyaway, Balung ki Rahu". misu qani ga nanak ulay Syasan ki Qrahu' nyux msthay la, kwara ulay sraral ga wal blun uraw kwara la. Kawas 1997 sllwan nha "ulay Gihing"qu "ulay Balung". tuqi 'san kya qu "Tay 7 Syan"ru "S_taw 118 haw" ssquliq pinlpgan misu qani maki te mtzyu' qalang gyencumin 'Tayal sa rgrgyax squ Taywan ga yasa son p'yang khmay na qalang gyencumin 'Tayal. gmlu sa nyux 'n_gyut khmay qu Toyen lga 'n_gyut khmay uzi ru magal kawas misu qani mga maki te spat lpgan qu kinhelaw nya tmuwang pzyux squliq nya squ kwara' ita Taywan. kisya' glgan Ungat kisya' glgan hiya kintzyux na Squliq kayal ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy 介壽國民小學 Pyasan pqwasan laqi cikuy 三光國民小學 Gogan pqwasan laqi cikuy 光華國民小學Ngurus pqwasan laqi cikuy 羅浮國民小學Kinyawpan pqwasan laqi cikuy 奎輝國民小學Qehuy pqwasan laqi cikuy 霞雲國民小學Hbun pqwasan laqi cikuy 三民國民小學Luhung pqwasan laqi cikuy 巴崚國民小學Balung pqwasan laqi cikuy 長興國民小學Kara pqwasan laqi cikuy 高義國民小學Qwilan pqwasan laqi cikuy 義盛國民小學Zihing pqwasan 'laqi cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas 介壽國民中學Pyasan pqwasan laqi mrkyas pqwasan biru 'laqi' seneng 羅浮高級中學Kinyawpan pqwasan biru laqi' seneng tokusan 1.qapu' 2.qqzimux 3.qapu' 4.tqinu 5.bsyaw hmgiru lmosay kya qu 'san mhkangi' na tuqi ru hongu' hkngyan ru ulay ru qrqhuniq ka ppi'an ru tgliq sa Rahu. basu lglgan ga kya "Tayuan k_yun"ru "cwungli k_yun"ru "Taywan hawsin"

== Hosing Ko(復興區 qalang Pyasan) == Pyasan hiya' ga spyang ini khmay sqoliq nya maki sa Toweng. Pyasan hiya' ga qotox lahoy qalang rgyax. Hosing Ko (復興區, Pyasan) mki sko Toweng si. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 336.75 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 195.32 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 120.65 km²), 10,692 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 3,655 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 6,817 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 64%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Tayan ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. rhzyal kki'an Xosing ga cyox maki sa tong nan na Toweng sohih Sinciko, yatox ga sobih Cyama. rekisi Foxing , lalo' nya 'Tayal sraral ga Pyasan, trang maki Gipon ga Sinciko syo Cyma gon, masop pciriq lga sllwan nha Pyasan. kawas 1954 te mpoo byacing ro mtzyol ryax lga sllwan nha Foxing syang la. skahol sinbong minrwan trang ryax nasa ga, "m_yan nyox sqqas ita' 'Tayal mha hintgan na soto ki nyox nha galon Taywan" lma', ro spwah nha syang kong so' miro biro teta smwan qo sexo'. kawas 2014 te mopo sazing byacing mposal magal ryax, yogon na sexo Toyen keng sa Toyen si' lga, yasa gmlo m'iyow sa Foxing cyo'i la. Kawas 2014 spwah nha "Taywan gyencomin polwo sintong lyenmong"kmal mha aki zyogon lalo na "Pyasan"sqo "Pyaway"ini ga "Pyasan Pyaway", ana ga ini swali' 'Tayal qalang Pyasan. ays ptyaw sebo Hosing Ko ays psgayon 10 ro 58 alang. 58 alang hani ga, Pyasan , Rahaw(Takan) , Wsilong , Hbon , Hbon-sinqomi , Kinyawpan , Rangay , Kawbo' , Khpan , Raga' , Raho' , Qapo' , Qos , Yobang , Triqan , Zihing , Kayo-baliq , Kzyay , Toba , Lohong , Blhoy , Blhoy , Bilos , Qoyaw , Qoyaw , Silong , Qoyaw , Snazi , Kin'lwan , Sqiy , Cyasi , Yowhbon raka , Kayway , Qos , Qmocyan ,Babao , Qnao , Ksono' , Qehoy , Koli , Sbonaw , Qori , Urow , Tkasan , Raka , Piyaway , Tgleq , Saroc , Twan nokan , Zihing , Qraho , Tqwiy , Ngoros , Qphay , Balong , 'Bo balong , Qara , Qozi . rhzyal​ tay 'zil na Hosing Ko hya' ga wsilong kraho'. tay 'zil na Hosing Ko hya' ga Nahoy go, Kansai go. toqi qsya' ki rrhzyal maki na ryax khangan Gipon na' ga kya magal qo olay nya, nano sga "Syasan, Qraho', Pyaway, Balong ki Raho". miso qani ga nanak olay Syasan ki Qraho' nyox msthay la, kwara olay sraral ga wal blon oraw kwara la. Kawas 1997 sllwan nha "olay Gihing"qo "olay Balong". toqi 'san kya qo "Tay 7 Syan"ro "S_taw 118 haw" ssqoliq pinlpgan miso qani maki te mtzyo' qalang gyencomin 'Tayal sa rgrgyax sqo Taywan ga yasa son p'yang khmay na qalang gyencomin 'Tayal. gmlo sa nyox 'n_gyot khmay qo Toyen lga 'n_gyot khmay ozi ro magal kawas miso qani mga maki te spat lpgan qo kinhelaw nya tmowang pzyox sqoliq nya sqo kwara' ita Taywan. kisya' glgan Ungat kisya' glgan hiya kintzyox na Sqoliq kayal ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy 介壽國民小學 Pyasan pqwasan laqi cikoy 三光國民小學 Gogan pqwasan laqi cikoy 光華國民小學Ngoros pqwasan laqi cikoy 羅浮國民小學Kinyawpan pqwasan laqi cikoy 奎輝國民小學Qehoy pqwasan laqi cikoy 霞雲國民小學Hbon pqwasan laqi cikoy 三民國民小學Lohong pqwasan laqi cikoy 巴崚國民小學Balong pqwasan laqi cikoy 長興國民小學Kara pqwasan laqi cikoy 高義國民小學Qwilan pqwasan laqi cikoy 義盛國民小學Zihing pqwasan 'laqi cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas 介壽國民中學Pyasan pqwasan laqi mrkyas pqwasan biro 'laqi' seneng 羅浮高級中學Kinyawpan pqwasan biro laqi' seneng tokosan 1.qapo' 2.qqzimox 3.qapo' 4.tqino 5.bsyaw hmgiro lmosay kya qo 'san mhkangi' na toqi ro hongo' hkngyan ro olay ro qrqhoniq ka ppi'an ro tgliq sa Raho. baso lglgan ga kya "Tayoan k_yon"ro "cwongli k_yon"ro "Taywan hawsin"
